title: Reenable RHEL CI job when nuget / corefx issue is fixed
body:
On RHEL7.2, nuget restore generates an empty targets element in the project.assets.json file, which ultimately leads to no netstandard references passed to msbuild: https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/8819#issuecomment-386130496

Reenable the RHEL CI job when these get fixed:
- https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/8819
- https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/29095
